title: 1 BR, 1 BA. Bring your pets! They will love it here! Visit us today!
posting_body: ['Welcome to The Covington Apartments!', '5800 American Blvd W Bloomington, MN 55437', 'Rental Size:', '1 BR - 1 BA - 767 sq ft |', 'Per Month:', '$1580 - $1585 |', 'Lease Length:', '3-Month, 4-Month, 5-Month, 6-Month, 7-Month, 8-Month, 9-Month, 10-Month, 11-Month, 12-Month, 13-Month, 14-Month, 15-Month, 16-Month', 'show contact info', 'Amazing.', 'Great staff.', 'The best.', 'A great place to call home.', "These words aren't ours-", "they're just some of the incredible reviews that you'll find describing The Covington Apartment Homes in Bloomington, Minnesota.", 'We work hard to make The Covington a great place to live, and we would love to welcome you into our friendly apartment community.', 'Our community features:', '◾ Business Center', '◾ Coffee Station', '◾ Conference Room', '◾ Courtyard', '◾ Disposal Chutes', '◾ Elevator', '◾ Guest Apartment', '◾ Pond', '◾ Pool', '◾ Weight Machines', '◾ Barbecue/Grill Area', '◾ Dry Cleaning Service', '◾ Fitness Programs/Classes', '◾ Furnished Units Available', '◾ Kingsley Excellence Award', '◾ Maintenance on Site', '◾ Package Deliver to Apartment', '◾ Planned Social Activities', '◾ Reservable Clubhouse', '◾ Yoga Classes Offered', 'Our unit features:', '◾ Air Conditioning', '◾ Full-Size Washer/Dryer in Every Home', '◾ Garbage Disposal', '◾ Granite Islands In Kitchen', '◾ Kitchen Island', '◾ Maple Cabinetry', '◾ Oversized Windows', '◾ Sliding Glass Doors', '◾ Smoke Free', '◾ Walk-In Closets', 'Contact us for more information!', '--', 'show contact info', '--', 'Our Pet-Policy:', 'Pet Friendly - Max 2 allowed, One time Fee $300.00, Rent $40.00, Deposit $200.00, Breed Restrictions Apply.', 'Website:', '<URL>', 'Property Management:', 'Weidner Apartment Homes, LLC', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', '69F740396C8A45B']
